summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear and testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906. The subpoena is signed by Audrey Strauss, the United States Attorney.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)), for which the subpoena is issued to compel testimony.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, issuing the command to the recipient.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on May 12, 2021, compelling an unnamed individual to testify in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
The testimony was scheduled for November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906 in Manhattan.
The subpoena was signed by Audrey Strauss, the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.
Failure to comply with the subpoena would constitute contempt of court and subject the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The document is part of the official court proceedings for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, case number 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
